leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 材料-DFT 生态（输入/求解/后处理）
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 结构生成→DFT→后处理→高通量→验证

unit.unit_name: AI加速DFT（代理/纠错/输入自动化）

queries: [WEB] LLM for materials science input generation github
[WEB] neural network force field implementation github

tools.name: ACEpotentials.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia implementation of Atomic Cluster Expansion (ACE) for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for fitting and evaluating Atomic Cluster Expansion (ACE) models, used for creating machine learning interatomic potentials in materials science and chemistry.

tools.name: MACE
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate machine learning interatomic potentials with higher order equivariant message passing
tools.detailed_description: MACE (Multi-Atomic Cluster Expansion) provides a unified framework for fast and accurate machine learning interatomic potentials, utilizing higher-order equivariant message passing neural networks.

tools.name: mace-foundations
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of foundation models for MACE (MP, OMAT, Matpes)
tools.detailed_description: A repository hosting pre-trained foundation models for the MACE architecture, including models trained on Materials Project (MP) and other datasets, enabling direct inference for materials properties.

tools.name: mace-jax
tools.one_line_profile: JAX implementation of MACE equivariant interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: The JAX-based implementation of the MACE architecture, offering hardware acceleration and differentiability for training equivariant machine learning interatomic potentials.

tools.name: mace-layer
tools.one_line_profile: Higher order equivariant graph neural networks library for 3D point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A core library implementing higher-order equivariant graph neural network layers, serving as the building block for MACE and other geometric deep learning models in atomistic systems.

tools.name: mace-off
tools.one_line_profile: Repository for MACE-OFF23 models
tools.detailed_description: Contains the MACE-OFF23 series of machine learning force field models, designed for organic molecules and force field parameterization.

tools.name: MOFSimBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for evaluating ML interatomic potentials in MOFs
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool designed to evaluate the performance of universal machine learning interatomic potentials specifically for metal-organic framework (MOF) molecular modeling tasks.

tools.name: EScAIP
tools.one_line_profile: Efficiently Scaled Attention Interatomic Potential implementation
tools.detailed_description: Official implementation of the Efficiently Scaled Attention Interatomic Potential (EScAIP), a machine learning model for predicting atomic forces and energies with attention mechanisms.

tools.name: Atomistica
tools.one_line_profile: Library of interatomic potentials compatible with ASE and LAMMPS
tools.detailed_description: A library providing a collection of interatomic potentials and force fields, designed to interface seamlessly with ASE (Atomic Simulation Environment) and LAMMPS for molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: HIP
tools.one_line_profile: Hessians with Interatomic Potentials
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for calculating Hessians (second derivatives of energy) using various interatomic potentials, useful for vibrational analysis and transition state theory.

tools.name: PES-Learn
tools.one_line_profile: Automated generation of ML models for molecular potential energy surfaces
tools.detailed_description: A software package that automates the generation of machine learning models for molecular potential energy surfaces (PES), streamlining the workflow from data generation to model training.

tools.name: WFacer
tools.one_line_profile: Modulated automation of cluster expansion based on atomate2 and Jobflow
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool for automating Cluster Expansion (CE) calculations, built upon atomate2 and Jobflow, facilitating the modeling of disordered materials and alloys.

tools.name: CHGNet
tools.one_line_profile: Pretrained universal neural network potential for charge-informed atomistic modeling
tools.detailed_description: A pretrained universal graph neural network potential that incorporates charge information for accurate atomistic modeling and molecular dynamics of materials.

tools.name: NequIP-LES
tools.one_line_profile: LES extension package for NequIP
tools.detailed_description: An extension for the NequIP software package, implementing the Local Environment Selection (LES) method or similar enhancements for equivariant neural network potentials.

tools.name: SPaiNN
tools.one_line_profile: Bridging Machine Learning and Photoinduced Dynamics with SchNet/PaiNN/SHARC
tools.detailed_description: A tool or workflow combining SchNet and PaiNN machine learning potentials with the SHARC molecular dynamics package for simulating photoinduced dynamics.

tools.name: SOG-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Sum-of-Gaussians Neural Network for machine learning force fields
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of SOG-Net, a lightweight neural network framework that integrates long-range interactions into machine learning force fields using a Sum-of-Gaussians approach.

tools.name: PNVmaps
tools.one_line_profile: Global Maps of Potential Natural Vegetation based on Machine Learning
tools.detailed_description: A tool and dataset for generating global maps of Potential Natural Vegetation (PNV) using machine learning techniques, applicable in ecology and environmental science.

tools.name: FeNNol
tools.one_line_profile: Force-field-enhanced Neural Networks optimized library
tools.detailed_description: A library for creating force-field-enhanced neural networks, optimizing the combination of physical force fields and machine learning models for atomistic simulations.

tools.name: FitSNAP
tools.one_line_profile: Software for generating machine-learning interatomic potentials for LAMMPS
tools.detailed_description: A software package for fitting Spectral Neighbor Analysis Potential (SNAP) and other machine learning interatomic potentials, designed to work with LAMMPS.

tools.name: PKU_MDAgent
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-Based Molecular Dynamics Agent for Code Generation
tools.detailed_description: An agent-based tool utilizing Large Language Models to generate code for molecular dynamics simulations and obtain material thermodynamic parameters.

tools.name: LLMatDesign
tools.one_line_profile: Autonomous Materials Discovery with Large Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A framework leveraging Large Language Models for autonomous materials discovery, enabling the design and modification of material structures through natural language or agentic workflows.

tools.name: MatDeepLearn
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks package for materials chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for applying graph neural networks (GNNs) to materials chemistry tasks, including property prediction and structure analysis.

tools.name: MEGNetSparse
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse representation GNN for defects in 2D materials
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing a graph neural network with sparse representation, specifically optimized for learning the properties of defects in 2D materials.

tools.name: CatBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for machine learning interatomic potentials in adsorption energy
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking framework designed to evaluate the performance of machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs), specifically focusing on adsorption energy predictions in catalysis applications.

tools.name: aiida-fleur
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the FLEUR DFT code
tools.detailed_description: An official AiiDA plugin that interfaces with the FLEUR code (all-electron DFT), enabling high-throughput electronic structure calculations and automated workflows.

tools.name: aiida-kkr
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for the JuKKR KKR-GF code
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow manager to interface with the JuKKR code (Korringa-Kohn-Rostoker Green Function method), facilitating high-throughput DFT calculations.

tools.name: JuLIP.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia library for interatomic potentials and molecular simulation
tools.detailed_description: A pure Julia library providing a framework for implementing and using interatomic potentials, including machine learning potentials, for molecular simulation and material modelling.

tools.name: VaSP
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for vascular fluid-structure-interaction simulation
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools designed for the pre-processing, simulation, and post-processing of vascular fluid-structure-interaction (FSI) problems in biomedical engineering.

tools.name: SIMPLE-NN
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network interatomic potential package
tools.detailed_description: SIMPLE-NN (SNU Interatomic Machine-learning PotentiaL packagE) is a software package for training and using neural network-based interatomic potentials for atomistic simulations.

tools.name: SevenNet
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network interatomic potential for multi-GPU MD
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network-based interatomic potential package that supports efficient multi-GPU parallel molecular dynamics simulations for materials science.

tools.name: k_SRME
tools.one_line_profile: Heat-conductivity benchmark for ML potentials
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark test suite designed to evaluate the accuracy of foundational machine-learning potentials in predicting heat conductivity properties of materials.

tools.name: NeuralIL
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable neural-network force field
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable neural-network force field implementation designed for modeling interatomic interactions with high accuracy, developed by Madsen's research group.

tools.name: Darwin
tools.one_line_profile: Foundational large language model for natural science
tools.detailed_description: An open-source foundational large language model specifically trained for natural science domains, including physics, chemistry, and materials science, to assist in scientific discovery and reasoning.

tools.name: PyXtal_FF
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning interatomic potential predictions
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for developing and using machine learning interatomic potentials, capable of predicting material properties and driving atomistic simulations.

tools.name: atomate2-lammps
tools.one_line_profile: LAMMPS workflows for atomate2
tools.detailed_description: An add-on package for the atomate2 workflow engine that implements standardized workflows for the LAMMPS molecular dynamics code, facilitating high-throughput MD simulations.

tools.name: cuEquivariance
tools.one_line_profile: CUDA-accelerated library for equivariant neural networks
tools.detailed_description: A math library providing optimized low-level primitives and tensor operations to accelerate equivariant neural network models (like MACE, Allegro, NEQUIP) used in scientific simulations and structure prediction.

tools.name: NewtonNet
tools.one_line_profile: Newtonian message passing network for deep learning of interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning framework for constructing interatomic potentials and force fields using a Newtonian message passing network architecture. It is designed to learn physics-aware representations for molecular and material systems.

tools.name: curator
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible workflow for on-the-fly learning of interatomic potential models
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool designed for active learning and on-the-fly training of interatomic potentials. It facilitates the automated selection of training data and refinement of potential models during molecular simulations.

tools.name: L2M3
tools.one_line_profile: Large Language Models Material Miner
tools.detailed_description: A tool leveraging Large Language Models (LLMs) to mine and extract materials science information from text. It automates the extraction of material properties, synthesis methods, and other relevant data from scientific literature.

tools.name: AMLP
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Machine Learning Potential workflow with LLM agents
tools.detailed_description: An integrated platform for creating, handling, and analyzing machine learning interatomic potentials. It supports interfaces with Gaussian, VASP, and CP2K, and utilizes LLM agents for code selection and automated analysis of molecular simulations.

tools.name: aiida-cusp
tools.one_line_profile: Custodian based VASP Plugin for AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that interfaces with VASP, utilizing Custodian for robust error handling and job management during high-throughput materials calculations.

tools.name: aiida-vasp
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for running VASP simulations
tools.detailed_description: The official AiiDA plugin for the Vienna Ab initio Simulation Package (VASP). It provides a framework for setting up, running, and analyzing VASP calculations in a reproducible and automated manner.

tools.name: aiida-common-workflows
tools.one_line_profile: Common workflow interfaces for materials science codes in AiiDA
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing standardized workflow interfaces for various quantum engines within AiiDA. It allows users to run materials properties calculations (like equations of state) using a unified API across different simulation codes.

tools.name: TorchANI
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of ANI neural network potentials
tools.detailed_description: An open-source library for training and using ANI-style neural network interatomic potentials. It enables accurate and fast molecular dynamics simulations and property prediction using deep learning.

tools.name: BindFlow
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for FEP and MM/PBSA calculations
tools.detailed_description: A reproducible workflow based on Snakemake for performing Free Energy Perturbation (FEP) and MM(PB/GB)SA binding energy calculations using GROMACS. It automates the setup and execution of these complex biomolecular simulations.

tools.name: apax
tools.one_line_profile: Flexible and performant framework for training machine learning potentials
tools.detailed_description: A JAX-based framework for training atomistic machine learning potentials, focusing on performance and flexibility for materials science simulations.

tools.name: arcann_training
tools.one_line_profile: Automated enhanced sampling for reactive MLIP training sets
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool for generating training sets for chemically reactive machine learning interatomic potentials using automated enhanced sampling techniques.

tools.name: ChemGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Agentic framework for computational chemistry workflows
tools.detailed_description: An AI agent framework designed to automate computational chemistry and materials science workflows, leveraging LLMs for task orchestration.

tools.name: active-learning-md
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning workflow for MLIP generation
tools.detailed_description: A workflow for generating machine learning interatomic potentials driven by active learning, specifically demonstrated for amorphous and liquid systems.

tools.name: mlip-arena
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark platform for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A fair and transparent benchmarking framework for evaluating machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) beyond basic error metrics.

tools.name: SchNetPack
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Neural Networks for Atomistic Systems
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for developing and applying deep neural networks to atomistic systems, enabling the prediction of potential energy surfaces and other quantum-chemical properties.

tools.name: SchNetPack-GSchNet
tools.one_line_profile: Generative G-SchNet extension for SchNetPack
tools.detailed_description: An extension to SchNetPack implementing G-SchNet, a generative model for 3D atomistic structures.

tools.name: ANI-1xnr
tools.one_line_profile: MLIP for condensed-phase reactive chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning interatomic potential model specifically designed for simulating condensed-phase reactive chemistry.

tools.name: autoplex
tools.one_line_profile: Automated fitting of machine learned interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automating the process of fitting machine learning interatomic potentials to reference data.

tools.name: mlipx
tools.one_line_profile: Machine-Learned Interatomic Potential eXploration tool
tools.detailed_description: A library for evaluating, visualizing, and comparing machine-learned interatomic potentials (MLIPs), developed at BASF.

tools.name: Artificial Intelligence Ontology
tools.one_line_profile: Ontology for AI/ML networks and methods
tools.detailed_description: An ontology modeling classes and relationships describing deep learning networks, layers, and machine learning methods, useful for scientific data standardization.

tools.name: ABFE_workflow
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for Absolute Binding Free Energy calculations
tools.detailed_description: A scalable Snakemake-based workflow for performing Absolute Binding Free Energy (ABFE) calculations in high-throughput environments.

tools.name: InteratomicPotentials.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia library for interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library implementing methods and types for various interatomic potentials used in atomistic simulations.

tools.name: PotentialLearning.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia framework for learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package for optimizing atomistic data and training interatomic potential models for molecular dynamics workflows.

tools.name: llamp
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-modal RAG agent for materials informatics
tools.detailed_description: A web app and API providing an agentic materials scientist framework powered by LLMs, grounded on high-fidelity materials informatics data.

tools.name: dftfit
tools.one_line_profile: Interatomic potential creation using DFT data
tools.detailed_description: A code for fitting interatomic potentials using Density Functional Theory (DFT) training data.

tools.name: blip
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Learned Interatomic Potentials
tools.detailed_description: Source code for training and using Bayesian Learned Interatomic Potentials (BLIP).

tools.name: DeePMD-GNN
tools.one_line_profile: DeePMD-kit plugin for Graph Neural Network (GNN) based potential energy models
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for DeePMD-kit that integrates various Graph Neural Network models for representing potential energy surfaces, enabling the use of GNN architectures within the DeePMD ecosystem for materials simulation.

tools.name: DeePMD-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for many-body potential energy representation and molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package designed to generate many-body potential energy representations and force fields for molecular dynamics simulations. It bridges the gap between the accuracy of ab initio methods and the efficiency of classical force fields.

tools.name: DP-GEN
tools.one_line_profile: Concurrent learning workflow for generating deep learning-based interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A workflow tool designed to generate deep learning-based models of interatomic potential energy and force fields. It implements a concurrent learning scheme (exploration, labeling, training) to automate the generation of robust machine learning potentials.

tools.name: XPOT
tools.one_line_profile: Cross-platform optimizer for machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A tool for optimizing machine learning interatomic potentials, supporting cross-platform usage. It assists in the fitting and refinement of potentials for materials simulation.

tools.name: PhaseForge
tools.one_line_profile: High-throughput alloy phase diagram prediction framework using MLIPs
tools.detailed_description: A framework for predicting alloy phase diagrams by integrating machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) with ATAT and CALPHAD modeling. It includes tools for structure relaxation, molecular dynamics, and TDB generation.

tools.name: Auto-QChem
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflow for DFT calculations of organic molecules
tools.detailed_description: An automated workflow designed for the generation, management, and storage of Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations specifically for organic molecules, facilitating high-throughput quantum chemistry.

tools.name: QCNN-HEP
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum Convolutional Neural Network package for HEP event classification
tools.detailed_description: An open-source package implementing Quantum Convolutional Neural Networks (QCNN) for classifying High Energy Physics (HEP) events from particle image data, developed to facilitate research in quantum machine learning for physics.

tools.name: MatDGL
tools.one_line_profile: Neural network package for crystal modeling and material science tasks
tools.detailed_description: A neural network package that enables researchers to train custom models for crystal modeling tasks. It utilizes graph neural networks to accelerate research and applications in materials science.

tools.name: CGAT
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal graph attention neural networks for materials property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Crystal Graph Attention Networks (CGAT) designed for predicting properties of crystalline materials. It utilizes graph neural networks to model the structural information of crystals.

tools.name: mlip
tools.one_line_profile: Library for training and applying Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials
tools.detailed_description: A library designed for the efficient training and application of Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIPs), facilitating atomistic simulations with machine learning accuracy.

tools.name: LangSim
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based agent framework for computational materials science
tools.detailed_description: An application leveraging Large Language Models (LLMs) to assist in computational materials science tasks, potentially acting as an agent to drive simulations or analyze data.

tools.name: amaceing_toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for creating inputs and processing outputs for atomistic simulations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to automate the creation of input files for various simulation codes (CP2K, MACE, etc.) and to post-process and evaluate the results of these simulations.

tools.name: AQME
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Quantum Mechanical Environments for chemistry workflows
tools.detailed_description: A suite of automated workflows for computational chemistry, including conformer generation, QM input file creation, and post-processing of outputs, supporting xTB and DFT calculations.

tools.name: PET-MAD
tools.one_line_profile: Universal interatomic potential for advanced materials modeling
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning interatomic potential model designed for advanced materials modeling, enabling efficient and accurate atomistic simulations.

tools.name: catalyticLAM
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Catalytic Large Atomic Model for catalysis
tools.detailed_description: A machine-learning-based interatomic potential specifically developed for catalysis applications, aiming to provide a universal model for catalytic systems.

tools.name: MatText
tools.one_line_profile: Text-based modeling of materials
tools.detailed_description: A tool for applying natural language processing techniques to materials science, enabling text-based modeling and analysis of material properties and descriptions.

tools.name: chemlift
tools.one_line_profile: Language-interfaced fine-tuning for chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A framework for fine-tuning language models for chemistry applications, facilitating the adaptation of general-purpose LLMs to chemical domains.

tools.name: macbench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for multimodal language models in chemistry and materials
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking suite designed to probe the limitations and capabilities of multimodal language models within the context of chemistry and materials research.

tools.name: ALF
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning framework for machine-learned interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A framework developed by LANL for performing active learning to train machine-learned interatomic potentials efficiently.

tools.name: NeuralForceField
tools.one_line_profile: Neural Network Force Field based on PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based implementation of Neural Network Force Fields for atomistic simulations, enabling high-accuracy molecular dynamics.

tools.name: alchemical-mlip
tools.one_line_profile: Alchemical machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A tool for developing and applying alchemical machine learning interatomic potentials, which can model compositional changes in materials.

tools.name: iprPy
tools.one_line_profile: NIST Interatomic Potential Repository property calculation tools
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python tools and workflows for calculating material properties using interatomic potentials, associated with the NIST Interatomic Potential Repository.

tools.name: phonon_uMLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Phonon property calculations using universal machine learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A tool to calculate phonon properties (band structures, DOS) by interfacing with multiple universal machine learning interatomic potentials (uMLIPs) like M3GNet, CHGNet, and MACE.

tools.name: MPWorks
tools.one_line_profile: Custom workflow manager for the Materials Project
tools.detailed_description: Merges pymatgen, custodian, and FireWorks into a custom workflow management system specifically designed for the high-throughput calculations of the Materials Project.

tools.name: atomate2
tools.one_line_profile: Library of computational materials science workflows
tools.detailed_description: A robust library of computational materials science workflows (for VASP, CP2K, etc.) built on top of Jobflow, Pymatgen, and FireWorks, designed for high-throughput computing.

tools.name: custodian
tools.one_line_profile: Just-in-time job management and error correction framework
tools.detailed_description: A simple, robust, and flexible just-in-time job management framework in Python that manages scientific calculations (like VASP, QChem) and performs automatic error correction.

tools.name: MPmorph
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for running and analyzing ab-initio molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools to run and analyze ab-initio molecular dynamics (AIMD) calculations, relying on the Materials Project stack (pymatgen, custodian, fireworks).

tools.name: M3GNet
tools.one_line_profile: Materials graph network with 3-body interactions for DFT surrogate modeling
tools.detailed_description: A graph neural network potential that includes 3-body interactions, serving as a universal DFT surrogate for crystal relaxation and property prediction across the periodic table.

tools.name: MatGL
tools.one_line_profile: Graph deep learning library for materials science
tools.detailed_description: A library for graph deep learning in materials science, implementing models like M3GNet and MEGNet for property prediction and interatomic potential development.

tools.name: mlearn
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark Suite for Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials
tools.detailed_description: A framework and benchmark suite for evaluating machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) for materials, providing datasets and evaluation metrics.

tools.name: MACE-H
tools.one_line_profile: GNN prediction of electronic Hamiltonians
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network model for predicting electronic Hamiltonians in atomic orbital representation, utilizing many-body messages for accurate electronic structure prediction.

tools.name: Accelerated DFT
tools.one_line_profile: Code samples and supporting info for Accelerated DFT
tools.detailed_description: Repository hosting code samples and supporting information for Microsoft's Accelerated DFT research, enabling reproduction and application of AI-accelerated density functional theory methods.

tools.name: Allegro
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable equivariant deep learning interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: An open-source code for building highly scalable and accurate E(3)-equivariant deep learning interatomic potentials, designed for large-scale molecular dynamics.

tools.name: FLARE
tools.one_line_profile: Fast Learning of Atomistic Rare Events
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python package for creating fast and accurate interatomic potentials using Gaussian Process Regression and other machine learning methods, with active learning capabilities.

tools.name: NequIP
tools.one_line_profile: E(3)-equivariant graph neural network interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A code for building E(3)-equivariant graph neural networks for data-efficient and accurate interatomic potentials, enabling high-fidelity molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: pair_nequip
tools.one_line_profile: LAMMPS pair style for NequIP potentials (Deprecated)
tools.detailed_description: LAMMPS interface for running molecular dynamics simulations using NequIP deep learning potentials. (Note: Deprecated in favor of pair_nequip_allegro).

tools.name: pair_nequip_allegro
tools.one_line_profile: LAMMPS pair styles for NequIP and Allegro potentials
tools.detailed_description: Provides LAMMPS pair styles to enable molecular dynamics simulations using NequIP and Allegro deep learning interatomic potentials.

tools.name: SGCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Slab graph convolutional neural networks for surface properties
tools.detailed_description: Implements Slab Graph Convolutional Neural Networks (SGCNN) specifically designed for predicting surface-related material properties from slab structures.

tools.name: alebrew
tools.one_line_profile: Uncertainty-biased molecular dynamics for potential learning
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of uncertainty-biased molecular dynamics (UBMD) for actively learning uniformly accurate interatomic potentials by exploring high-uncertainty regions.

tools.name: PaiNN-model
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of PaiNN interatomic potential model
tools.detailed_description: A simple and efficient implementation of the PaiNN (Polarizable Atom Interaction Neural Network) model for constructing machine learning interatomic potentials.

tools.name: KLIFF
tools.one_line_profile: KIM-based Learning-Integrated Fitting Framework
tools.detailed_description: A physics-informed machine learning framework for fitting interatomic potentials, integrated with the OpenKIM project for materials modeling.

tools.name: ORB Models
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained foundation models (force fields) for atomistic simulations
tools.detailed_description: A collection of machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) developed by Orbital Materials, designed to predict energy and forces for materials and molecules, serving as surrogates for expensive DFT calculations.

tools.name: MACE-Osaka24
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained MACE models for materials simulations
tools.detailed_description: A repository of pre-trained MACE (Multi-Atomic Cluster Expansion) machine learning potential models developed by QIQB Osaka, providing ready-to-use surrogates for molecular dynamics and property prediction.

tools.name: CUDA-MACE
tools.one_line_profile: CUDA implementation of MACE interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance CUDA implementation of the MACE (Multi-Atomic Cluster Expansion) model, designed to accelerate molecular dynamics simulations and inference for materials science.

tools.name: Jrystal
tools.one_line_profile: JAX-based Differentiable Density Functional Theory Framework
tools.detailed_description: A differentiable Density Functional Theory (DFT) library built on JAX, enabling gradient-based optimization of material structures and properties, and facilitating the integration of physical models with machine learning workflows.

tools.name: MT-CGCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Multitask learning integration with Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks for material property prediction
tools.detailed_description: An implementation integrating Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks (CGCNN) with Multitask Learning to predict multiple material properties simultaneously, improving generalization and efficiency.

tools.name: aiida-mlip
tools.one_line_profile: AiiDA plugin for running Machine Learning Interatomic Potentials (MLIPs)
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the AiiDA workflow engine that facilitates the training and usage of machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs) such as MACE, GAP, and others within automated scientific workflows.

tools.name: janus-core
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for machine learnt interatomic potentials and molecular dynamics
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and utilities developed by STFC for working with machine learning interatomic potentials (MLIPs), supporting tasks like molecular dynamics simulations and single-point calculations.

tools.name: GATGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Convolutional Neural Networks with Global Attention for materials property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of Graph Convolutional Neural Networks enhanced with a global attention mechanism to improve the accuracy of material property predictions from crystal structures.

tools.name: nequip-eqx
tools.one_line_profile: JAX implementation of NequIP equivariant neural network potential
tools.detailed_description: A JAX-based implementation of the NequIP architecture, providing E(3)-equivariant neural network interatomic potentials for molecular dynamics and materials simulation.

tools.name: mlff
tools.one_line_profile: JAX-based framework for machine learning force fields
tools.detailed_description: A Python package using JAX to build, train, and evaluate neural networks for machine learning force fields (MLFF) in atomistic simulations.

tools.name: CGCNN
tools.one_line_profile: Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks for materials property prediction
tools.detailed_description: The original implementation of Crystal Graph Convolutional Neural Networks (CGCNN), a machine learning framework for predicting material properties directly from the connection of atoms in the crystal.

tools.name: UF3
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-Fast Force Fields for interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for generating ultra-fast interatomic potentials using linear regression of two- and three-body basis functions (B-splines), enabling rapid evaluation for molecular dynamics.

tools.name: Finetuna
tools.one_line_profile: Active learning framework for machine learning potentials
tools.detailed_description: A python package designed to automate the active learning process for training machine learning interatomic potentials, optimizing the selection of training data from molecular dynamics simulations.

tools.name: DeeperGATGNN
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable and deeper graph neural networks for materials property prediction
tools.detailed_description: An advanced version of GATGNN that employs deeper graph neural network architectures to improve scalability and accuracy in predicting properties of inorganic materials.

tools.name: Pynta
tools.one_line_profile: Automated workflow for reaction path exploration on metallic surfaces
tools.detailed_description: An automated workflow tool designed to explore reaction paths and transition states on metallic surfaces, streamlining the calculation of reaction barriers and mechanisms in catalysis.

tools.name: SciLink
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-powered agents for materials science research
tools.detailed_description: A framework that utilizes Large Language Model (LLM) agents to bridge experimental materials science with computational modeling and literature analysis, enabling automated reasoning and task execution.

tools.name: IPSuite
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for managing and training machine learned interatomic potentials
tools.detailed_description: A suite of tools designed to facilitate the creation, training, and validation of machine learning interatomic potentials, supporting various descriptors and models.

tools.name: AIMNet2
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and transferable neural network interatomic potential
tools.detailed_description: The second generation of AIMNet (Atoms-in-Molecules Neural Network), providing a fast, accurate, and transferable interatomic potential for molecular simulations across diverse chemical spaces.
